DOC.brief_summary: Patients knee Osteoarthritis high prevalence pain , require ever precise intervention management . This study aim investigate immediate effect manual therapy TENS pain patient knee Osteoarthritis . Knowledge best intervention favor reduce spending health safety patient .
DOC.brief_title: Immediate Effects Manual Therapy Versus TENS Patients With Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim compare efficacy manual therapy TENS immediate control pain patient knee osteoarthritis . They include 62 patient clinical radiological diagnosis knee osteoarthritis , present pain least 3 VAS , recruit rheumatology geriatrics clinic Fortaleza / CE prior screen . Will three assessment , prior intervention , immediately 72 hour . The data collect shall appear individual print record . Participants divide two therapy group , one apply manual therapy TENS . There randomisation allocation individual group nature intervention evaluator may blind . In manual therapy group assign protocol manual passive stretch quadriceps muscle , hamstring , triceps surae , adductor abductor hip ; myofascial release peripatellar ; joint mobilization grade 1 2 tibiofemoral joint femoro - patellar affect knee . In TENS group apply continuous current mode , frequency 100Hz pulse width 50Î¼s 40 minute single application . The intensity define patient , stimulus consider intense , pleasant . The Kolmogorov - Smirnov test use verify data distribution normality . The characterization participant perform mean descriptive statistical analysis . Parametric non-parametric test use accord data distribution normality comparison group baseline . The evaluator blinding test use chi -square test compare randomization code evaluator opinion . The difference group respective confidence interval calculate linear mixed model use interaction term `` time versus group . ''
DOC.criteria: Knee osteoarthritis diagnose clinical criterion establish American College Rheumatology radiological criterion KelgrenLawrence Age 50 year Pain intensity 2 VAS Other systemic inflammatory disease Changes sensitivity Use antiinflammatory steroid , tranquillizer and/or antidepressant last month Analgesic last 24 hour Use cardiac pacemaker
